Texts of Akselrod’s Writings

Throughout the bibliography, texts that are available on this site have been marked. This is a list of those same texts.

English Translations

Year Title File
1906 On the National Question. Pdf
1907 The Theory of Value and Dialectical Materialism (On the 40th Anniversary of "Capital"), "Contemporary World," 1907. Pdf
1909 Review of "Materialism and Empiriocriticism," "Contemporary World," 1909, June, № 7. Pdf
1922 From My Memories of G. V. Plekhanov, “Under the Banner of Marxism,” № 5-6, May-June 1922, pp. 77-86. Pdf
1925 Spinoza and Materialism, "Red Virgin Soil," 1925, № 7, pp. 144-168. [From: Spinoza in Soviet Philosophy, selected and translated by George L. Kline, NY: Humanities Press, 1952, pp. 61-89.] Pdf
1927 Enough!, "Red Virgin Soil," 1927, № 3, pp. 171-181. Pdf
1927 Reply to A. Deborin’s "Our Differences," "Red Virgin Soil," 1927, № 5, pp. 136-163. Pdf
